metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4399 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability. In Grafana Enterprise, Request security is a deny list that allows admins to configure Grafana in a way so that the instance doesnâ€™t call specific hosts. However, the restriction can be bypassed used punycode encoding of the characters in the request address.

criterions.comment: grafana: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
